mapper.select: select c.member_no AS memberNo, c.member_id AS memberId, c.member_pw AS memberPw, c.member_nickname AS memberNickname, c.member_phone AS memberPhone, c.member_addr AS memberAddr, c.member_gender AS memberGender, c.member_email AS memberEmail, c.enroll_date AS enrollDate, c.profile_path AS profilePath, c.profile_name AS profileName, (select member_type from tbl_whole_member z where z.member_no = c.member_no ) AS memberType, case when reporter_yn > 0 OR suspect_yn > 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end loginChkYn from ( select a.member_no, count(reporter_yn) reporter_yn, count(suspect_yn) suspect_yn from ( select a.member_no, case when van_cnt > 0 and van_cnt < 3 then NVL((select 'N' from tbl_access_restriction z where z.report_no in (select report_no from tbl_report w where w.reporter = a.member_no and w.report_result = 'D') and sysdate between z.rest_start_date and z.rest_end_date) , 'Y') when van_cnt >= 3 then 'N' else 'Y' end reporter_yn, '' suspect_yn from ( select a.member_no, count(reporter) van_cnt from tbl_exco a, tbl_report c where a.member_id = #{memberId} and a.member_pw = #{memberPw} and a.member_no = c.reporter(+) and c.report_result (+)= 'D' group by a.member_no ) a union select a.member_no, '' reporter_yn, case when van_cnt > 0 and van_cnt < 3 then NVL((select 'N' from tbl_access_restriction z where z.report_no in (select report_no from tbl_report w where w.suspect= a.member_no and w.report_result = 'Y') and sysdate between z.rest_start_date and z.rest_end_date) , 'Y') when van_cnt >= 3 then 'N' else 'Y' end suspect_yn from ( select a.member_no, count(suspect) van_cnt from tbl_exco a, tbl_report c where a.member_id = #{memberId} and a.member_pw = #{memberPw} and a.member_no = c.suspect(+) and c.report_result (+)= 'Y' group by a.member_no ) a ) a group by a.member_no ) a, tbl_exco c where a.member_no = c.member_no

SELECT exco.member_no AS memberNo, exco.member_id AS memberId, exco.member_pw AS memberPw, exco.member_nickname AS memberNickname, exco.member_phone AS memberPhone, exco.member_addr AS memberAddr, exco.member_gender AS memberGender, exco.member_email AS memberEmail, exco.enroll_date AS enrollDate, exco.profile_path AS profilePath, exco.profile_name AS profileName, whole.member_type AS memberType, expert.permission_state AS permissionState, expert.receive_no AS receiveNo, expert.expert_file_name AS expertFileName, expert.expert_file_path AS expertFilePath, expert.expert_grade AS expertGrade, expert.third_category_cd AS thirdCategoryCd FROM tbl_exco exco, tbl_whole_member whole, tbl_expert_management expert WHERE exco.member_no = whole.member_no AND exco.member_no = expert.member_no AND exco.member_id = #{memberId} AND exco.member_pw = #{memberPw}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_exco (member_no, member_id, member_pw, member_nickname, member_phone, member_addr, member_gender, member_email, enroll_date ) values ( #{memberNo}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberAddr}, #{memberGender}, #{memberEmail}, sysdate )
